bloom.comment: All our VIP clients now interact with the bot — fast, convenient, and error-free. It remembers preferences, suggests bouquets, and accepts payments. A truly modern solution that matches our service standards.

wow.author: Robert
wow.comment: Just a week after launching the bot, we saw a 27% increase in orders. The bot asks customers everything we need — color, date, wishes. We simply pack and send. Super convenient.

sweet.author: Alina
sweet.comment: With the chatbot, we fully automated cake orders. We used to spend 4–5 hours a day messaging clients — now it’s just 20–30 minutes. No missed orders, everything runs smoothly. Clients are happy, and we finally have more time for creativity.

english.author: Natalia
english.comment: The team helped us build a Telegram funnel. With the bot, users sign up for a trial lesson, receive materials, and then purchase the course. Automation boosted our conversion rate by 35%. Grateful for the smart approach.

relaxTour.author: Victoria
relaxTour.comment: We used to lose up to 40% of inquiries while waiting for a manager to respond. Now the bot replies instantly, suggests tours, and captures interest. In just the first 2 weeks — 63 extra leads with no increase in ad spend.

staffUp.author: Christian
staffUp.comment: Manual candidate screening used to take weeks — and half the applicants would just disappear. After launching the chatbot, it now handles initial interviews, collects resumes, and even tests skills. No more endless calls or emails. The result: 17 extra vacancies filled in a month, and hiring time cut by 3x. Thanks for the smart solution!

adSpark.author: Patrick
adSpark.comment: We use chatbots together with automated funnels for our clients — plus content generation and autoposting. The team set everything up end-to-end: from logic to full integration with ad platforms. A solid solution with a proactive approach.

streetBox.comment: The bot helped cut support workload — 80% of inquiries are now handled automatically. Customers can track orders, get info on returns and delivery, all without a manager involved. Huge resource saver.

implemented.title: How quickly can the product be implemented in your business?
implemented.content:
Ready-made solutions – for standard niches, the bot can be launched in 2–3 days.



Turnaround time: From 48 hours (standard) to 10 days (custom integrations).



Custom setup – if business processes are complex, implementation may take slightly longer, but the result will be precise and effective.

additional.title: Additional features / Flexible configuration
additional.content:
Our chatbots offer a wide range of additional functions that adapt to the needs of your business.



You can integrate the bot with CRM systems (e.g. Bitrix24, Salesforce), messengers (WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber) and social networks.



We provide the ability to customize dialogue scenarios taking into account the specifics of your industry, including multi-level dialogues, automatic request processing and personalization of communication.



Analytics functions are also available: tracking user activity, collecting preference data and generating reports.

manage.title: How easy is it to manage?
manage.content:
Managing our chatbots is intuitive and does not require any special technical knowledge.



We provide a convenient control panel with a simple interface where you can set up scenarios, edit responses and track statistics.



Basic changes, such as updating information or adding new questions, are just a few clicks away.



If more complex settings are needed, our team provides training and support so that you can manage the bot yourself.

necessity.title: Do I need a website to use a chatbot?
necessity.content:
No, you don't need a website to use our chatbots.



They can operate in any channel where your customers are — messengers (Telegram, WhatsApp, Viber), social media (Facebook, Instagram), or even mobile apps.



If you do have a website, we can integrate the bot there to enhance user interaction, but that’s just one of many options.



For example, the bot can handle communication, collect requests, or process orders — all without being tied to a website.



We’ll help you choose the best platforms for your business — wherever your audience is most active.
